comments.body:
s/GlobalizeCompiler/globalizeCompiler/
You should use cameCase about namespace.

The [TypeScript Style Guide](https://github.com/Microsoft/TypeScript/wiki/Coding-guidelines) recommends PascalCase for types.

Numerous examples in DT set precedent. Clicking around randomly:
- https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/amcharts/AmCharts.d.ts#L7
- https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/chai-dom/chai-dom.d.ts#L8
- https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/hystrixjs/hystrixjs.d.ts#L9
